channel.title: Help..again
channel.description:
hey, im using trisidax source and i want to change the crown of the staff and add a crown to the extreme donator it dosent have a crown... and i have another problem prayer dosent work when i click at any one like mele protection or range or anything it stay at 99 it dosent get down please help and last problem is when i get in into the server it give me a message "thanks for downloading trisidiax soure...if you using this please give criedt to trasidateam how to remove that
if any one helped me with thos i will pay hem 5m rsgp. i really need help.

and here it is the command (the code)! http://tinypic.com/r/3133v4o/6
this is what i copyed and here where i paste it
http://tinypic.com/r/dzb5vd/6

and i got 43 errors what i have did wrong please?[/quote]

Put the code in tags on here instead of taking pictures please

item.title: Help..again
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

100 errors is usually a bracket issue. Make sure yore copying the whole command and adding it directly underneath the other one. Post what you attempted here and people will give you guidance

Read full topic

item.description:

i really tried but it gived me 100 errors if it is really easy why you dont download the commands file that i have upload and add what should be there and reupload and paste it here please i really tried just do this?

Read full topic

item.title: Help..again
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

You’re saying you don’t know how to selected text, paste, change the name of the command and then finally change one if not two lines of code? The lines of code that I have provided for you.

You really shouldn’t start with this if you can’t.

Read full topic

item.title: Help..again
item.dc:creator: @Iyal1234 Iyal1234
item.description:
@Iyal1234 wrote:

thanks but idk how to do it may you please do it i uploaded the file just do it please i will learn i promis
please to it for me?

Read full topic

item.title: Help..again
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

For example, you can copy the ::kick command, and change it to ::giveadmin.

Instead of having disconnected = true; it would be playerRights = 3;

Mess around with it and see what you come up with, then post any problems you have

Read full topic

item.title: Help..again
item.dc:creator: @Iyal1234 Iyal1234
item.description:
@Iyal1234 wrote:

[quote=“ohokay, post:6, topic:478743”]Just use the base of another command to make what you want. The whole point is to make you learn, not let other people add the stuff for you.[/quote] idk how to do that so i want to compare the file i upload to the file that i will rescive so that how i learn.
so what do you mean “just use the base of another command to make what you want”?

thanks for reading please dont ignoring it is very easy to you guys so why you dont tell me?

Read full topic

item.title: Help..again
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Just use the base of another command to make what you want. The whole point is to make you learn, not let other people add the stuff for you.

Read full topic

item.title: Help..again

item.description:

but when i ::kick it dosent work or ban or givedonor or anything any other help would be nice please…

Read full topic

item.title: Help..again
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

Trisidiax has an different command system and i am sure it already got the givedonor givemod giveadmin etc… U need to change the owner name in config.java

item.description:
@Iyal1234 wrote:

ty for helping me but i got another problem that i dont know how to add the command to make a player donor or mod or admin so please
i uploaded the commands file so you can add the command that make the player donor super donor or extreme and mod and admin
and maybe if you can please add the ::checkstats “playername” please

here is the commands file
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/95889425/Commands.rar
please please add what i have asked and reupload it and reply if any one did that it would be really nice.
please.

Read full topic

item.title: Help..again
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Staff crown, just change it in the sprites folder of the client. For the donator crown, you’ll have to add it manually within the client if its not already in there. Follow some tutorials on this, it’s simple enough.

Prayer, Well it sounds like it doesn’t work at all, so you’ll have to add it yourself. I’m sure there are tutorials for this, no one is going to spoon feed you this.

For the login message, find where the players login is processed and just push a message through to the player

Ps, don’t offer rsgp

Read full topic
